sentences.en: A subterranean stream is flowing through this area.
sentences.cn: 有一条地下河流经这个区域.

sentences.en: All night he heard the subterranean workman, who continued to mine his way.
sentences.cn: 他整夜都听着那个隐蔽的工作者, 那个人在继续他的挖掘工程.

sentences.en: Amaranthine cane, climb on the ground, greenery grows on the cane, subterranean knot muskmelon.
sentences.cn: 紫红藤, 地上爬, 藤上长绿叶, 地下结甜瓜.

sentences.en: But actual condition, is more complicated than seeing that outside even, the subterranean flow is turbulent.
sentences.cn: 而实际的情况, 甚至比表面看到的还要复杂, 暗流汹涌.

sentences.en: But subterranean suburbia, Dutch - style, is about to become respectable and chic.
sentences.cn: 但是地下郊区居民, 荷兰方式, 变得值得尊敬的和别致的.

sentences.en: Father tells Xiaoming: " This is Electricity Supply Board is installing subterranean cable. "
sentences.cn: 爸爸告诉小明: “ 这是供电局在安装地下电缆. ”

sentences.en: For decades, the tunnels of the Solotvyno Salt Mine in Ukraine have hosted subterranean convalescents.
sentences.cn: 数十年来, 乌克兰Solotvyno盐矿的洞群一直款待着来地下疗养的患者.

sentences.en: Franz took the lamp , and entered the subterranean grotto, followed by Gaetano.
sentences.cn: 弗兰兹拿着火把走进了地下岩洞, 后面跟着盖太诺.

sentences.en: London has 9 miles of such subterranean passages.
sentences.cn: 伦敦像这样的地下通道有9英里长。

sentences.en: Never ignore a subterranean gate, lest you allow an enemy to approach unseen.
sentences.cn: 千万不要忽视地下城入口, 以免被敌人突然袭击.

sentences.en: Showdown in the Subterranean Online only Hun is revealed to be behind the mutant attack.
sentences.cn: 4摊牌在洪森的地下网络是唯一被发现的背后突变攻击.

sentences.en: Subterranean rodents are rodents which live in special ecotope.
sentences.cn: [中英文摘要]地下鼠是一类生活在特殊生境中的啮齿动物,是研究动物适应进化的理想材料.

sentences.en: The prothalli are saprophytic, irregularly branched, subterranean bodies.
sentences.cn: 原叶体是腐生的, 不规则分枝的地下体.

sentences.en: Three kinds of mathematical models of fuzzy transformation is used in evaluation of subterranean water pollution.
sentences.cn: 讨论了地下水水质污染模糊综合评判中的三种数学模型.

words.tran_cn: 地下的；隐匿的（等于 subterranean）

trans.tran_cn: 地表下面的，地下的，隐藏的，暗中的
trans.tran_en: beneath the surface of the earth
